markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Prisoner](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3454)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Most who end up in a jail, dungeon, or prison are just biding their time through the interminable days until their imprisonment ends. Some, however, use force and intimidation to gain status, and create makeshift weapons to take down their enemies or use in a jailbreak.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Prisoner](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3454)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 40

**Perception** +6

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +6, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +3, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) +7, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
shiv

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +4 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +6 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 17

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shiv +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 bludgeoning

**Sneak Attack**   The prisoner deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) creatures.

**Surprise Attack**   On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) to the prisoner.

**You're Next** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Trigger** The prisoner reduces a creature to 0 Hit Points; **Effect** The prisoner attempts to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=2395) a creature that saw their victory, with a +2 circumstance bonus to the [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) check.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-535" />
name: Prisoner
